channel.title: Mindful Mormons
channel.description: Mindful Mormons is a podcast that tries to bridge the gap between LDS people and non-LDS people who live in the state of Utah
channel.itunes:author: Shaun Belliston
channel.itunes:subtitle: Mindful Mormons is a podcast that tries to bridge the gap between LDS people and non-LDS people who live in the state of Utah
channel.itunes:summary: Mindful Mormons is a podcast that tries to bridge the gap between LDS people and non-LDS people who live in the state of Utah

item.title: Episode 1
item.description: Shaun and Arrio discuss the benefits of mindfulness and the tendency of the Utah Latter-Day Saint community to isolate its fellow non-LDS community members.
item.itunes:author: Shaun Belliston
item.itunes:subtitle: Shaun and Arrio discuss the benefits of mindfulness and the tendency of the Utah Latter-Day Saint community to isolate its fellow non-LDS community members.
item.itunes:summary: Shaun and Arrio discuss the benefits of mindfulness and the tendency of the Utah Latter-Day Saint community to isolate its fellow non-LDS community members.
